Ext.namespace("Ext.asset.raw.company");Ext.asset.raw.company.g_url="asset/raw_company.do";Ext.asset.raw.company.extWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{params:{},constructor:function(){this.form=new Ext.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",autoHeight:true,border:false,bodyStyle:"padding:5px;",labelWidth:65,items:[{xtype:"fjs-store-radio",name:"Suffix",fieldLabel:"文件类型",dictId:"system.export.excel",groupcfg:{name:"Suffix"}}]});Ext.asset.raw.company.extWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-excel",title:"Excel 格式",width:320,autoHeight:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",modal:true,plain:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-accept1",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){this.params.action="export";this.form.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.asset.raw.company.g_url,params:this.params,success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))},apply_success:function(form,opts){Ext.fjs.download("/down.php?filename="+opts.result.message);this.window_close()}});Ext.asset.raw.company.addWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{constructor:function(grid){this.grid=grid;this.form=new Ext.form.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",fileUpload:true,layout:"html",layoutConfig:{css:"fjs-form",template:"asset/raw_company.tpl"},style:"padding-top:0px",items:[{xtype:"fjs-store-combo",name:"TID",hiddenName:"TID",width:150,allowBlank:false,allrec:false,dictId:"asset.raw.owner"},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CA",width:480,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:3,maxLength:100},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CB",width:180,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:3,maxLength:20},{xtype:"fileuploadfield",name:"files",width:180,emptyText:"选择文件路径",allowBlank:true,anchor:"95%",buttonText:"选择文件"},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CD",width:480,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:3,maxLength:100},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CE",width:150,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:2,maxLength:20},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CF",width:180,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:7,maxLength:50},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CG",width:480,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:3,maxLength:100},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CH",width:180,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:9,maxLength:20},{xtype:"fjs-store-combo",hiddenName:"CK",width:150,allowBlank:false,allrec:false,dictUrl:"fjs/set_bank.do?action=tree"}]});Ext.asset.raw.company.addWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-add",title:"企业信息",width:680,autoHeight:true,autoScroll:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",plain:true,modal:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-save",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){var f=this.form;if(Ext.fjs.checkValid(f)){var fv=f.getForm().findField("files").getValue();if(/(jpg|jpeg|png|bmp)$/i.test(fv)){f.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.saveAction({url:Ext.asset.raw.company.g_url,params:{action:"save"},success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))}else{Ext.fjs.showInfo("请选择后缀是jpg,jpeg,png,bmp的图片文件！")}}},apply_success:function(form,opts){this.form.getForm().reset();this.grid.refresh();this.window_close()}});Ext.asset.raw.company.modWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{constructor:function(grid){this.grid=grid;this.form=new Ext.form.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",fileUpload:true,layout:"html",layoutConfig:{css:"fjs-form",template:"asset/raw_companys.tpl"},style:"padding-top:0px",items:[{xtype:"displayfield",name:"CID"},{xtype:"fjs-store-combo",name:"TID",hiddenName:"TID",allowBlank:false,allrec:false,dictId:"asset.raw.owner",width:150},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CA",width:480,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:3,maxLength:100},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CB",width:180,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:3,maxLength:20},{xtype:"fileuploadfield",name:"files",width:180,emptyText:"选择文件路径",allowBlank:true,anchor:"95%",buttonText:"选择文件"},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CD",width:480,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:3,maxLength:100},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CE",width:150,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:2,maxLength:20},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CF",width:180,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:7,maxLength:50},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CG",width:480,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:3,maxLength:100},{xtype:"textfield",name:"CH",width:180,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:9,maxLength:20},{xtype:"fjs-store-combo",hiddenName:"CK",width:150,allowBlank:false,allrec:false,dictUrl:"fjs/set_bank.do?action=tree"}]});Ext.asset.raw.company.modWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-edit",title:"企业信息",width:680,autoHeight:true,autoScroll:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",plain:true,modal:true,resizable:true,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-save",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){var f=this.form;if(Ext.fjs.checkValid(f)){var fv=f.getForm().findField("files").getValue();if(fv.length<5||/(jpg|jpeg|png|bmp)$/i.test(fv)){f.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.saveAction({url:Ext.asset.raw.company.g_url,params:{action:"save",cid:this.cid},success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))}else{Ext.fjs.showInfo("请选择后缀是jpg,jpeg,png,bmp的图片文件！")}}},apply_success:function(form,opts){this.form.getForm().reset();this.grid.refresh();this.window_close()},loader_success:function(res,opts){var rs=opts.result.data;this.show();Ext.fjs.image("raw_yyzz",rs.CC.toLowerCase())},open:function(cid){this.cid=cid;this.form.getForm().load(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.asset.raw.company.g_url,params:{action:"getInfo",cid:cid},success:this.loader_success,scope:this}))}});Ext.asset.raw.company.MainPanel=Ext.extend(Ext.grid.GridPanel,{constructor:function(){this.addBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-add",text:"增加",tooltip:"增加",disabled:false,handler:this.add_onclick,scope:this});this.modBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-edit",text:"修改",tooltip:"请选择一行",disabled:true,handler:this.mod_onclick,scope:this});this.delBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-delete",text:"删除",tooltip:"请选择一行",disabled:true,handler:this.del_onclick,scope:this});this.btns=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"mnu-wrench_orange",text:"批量操作",menu:[{iconCls:"btn-excel",text:"导出数据",handler:this.export_onclick,scope:this},{iconCls:"mnu-note_go",text:"发布票据",disabled:true,handler:this.send_onclick,scope:this}]});var sm=new Ext.grid.CheckboxSelectionModel();var cm=new Ext.grid.ColumnModel([sm,new Ext.grid.RowNumber()<s:header id="asset.raw.company"/>]);this.store=new Ext.fjs.PageStore({url:Ext.asset.raw.company.g_url,baseParams:{action:"list"},fields:[<s:fields id="asset.raw.company"/>]});this.store.load({params:{start:0,limit:Ext.fjs.defPSize}});Ext.asset.raw.company.MainPanel.superclass.constructor.call(this,{region:"center",store:this.store,stripeRows:true,autoScroll:true,boldHeader:true,closable:true,containerScroll:true,columnLines:true,cm:cm,sm:sm,loadMask:true,tbar:[this.fsel=new Ext.fjs.form.StoreComboBox({xtype:"fjs-store-combo",hiddenName:"fsel",dictId:"asset.raw.owner",allowBlank:true,allrec:true,width:85}),{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},this.fcom=new Ext.fjs.form.StoreComboBox({xtype:"fjs-store-combo",hiddenName:"fcom",dictId:"asset.raw.coms",allowBlank:true,allrec:true,width:90}),{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},this.fkey=new Ext.form.TextField({xtype:"textfield",name:"fkey",width:100,maxLength:50}),{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},{iconCls:"btn-search",tooltip:"查询",handler:this.search_onclick,scope:this},"->",this.addBtn,"-",this.modBtn,"-",this.delBtn,"-",this.btns],bbar:Ext.fjs.PageToolBar({store:this.store})});this.getSelectionModel().on("selectionchange",this.evt_selection,this);this.on("rowdblclick",this.mod_onclick,this)},evt_selection:function(sm){var bts=this.btns.menu.items,len=sm.getCount();if(len==1){this.modBtn.enable();this.delBtn.enable();bts.itemAt(1).enable()}else{this.modBtn.disable();this.delBtn.disable();bts.itemAt(1).disable()}},getCid:function(){return Ext.fjs.getPKId(this,"CID")},refresh:function(){this.getBottomToolbar().doRefresh()},search_onclick:function(){var s=this.store;s.setBaseParam("TID",this.fsel.getValue());s.setBaseParam("COM",this.fcom.getValue());s.setBaseParam("KEY",this.fkey.getValue());s.load({params:{start:0,limit:this.getBottomToolbar().pageSize}})},add_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.addWin;if(!w){this.addWin=w=new Ext.asset.raw.company.addWindow(this)};w.show(btn.id)},mod_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.modWin;if(!w){this.modWin=w=new Ext.asset.raw.company.modWindow(this)};w.open(this.getCid())},del_onclick:function(){Ext.msg.confirm(Ext.fjs.NOTICE,Ext.fjs.del_confirm,this.delConfirm,this)},delConfirm:function(btn){if(btn=="yes"){Ext.fjs.post({url:Ext.asset.raw.company.g_url,params:{action:"delete",ids:this.getCid()},success:this.apply_success,scope:this})}},send_onclick:function(btn){Ext.fjs.post({url:Ext.asset.raw.company.g_url,params:{action:"send",ids:this.getCid()},success:this.apply_success,scope:this})},apply_success:function(res,opts){var rs=Ext.decode(res.responseText);if(rs.success){Ext.fjs.showInfo(rs.message);this.refresh()}else{Ext.fjs.showError(rs.message)}},export_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.extWin;if(!w){this.extWin=w=new Ext.asset.raw.company.extWindow()};w.show(btn.id)},beforeDestroy:function(){if(this.addWin)Ext.destroy(this.addWin);if(this.modWin)Ext.destroy(this.modWin);if(this.extWin)Ext.destroy(this.extWin);Ext.asset.raw.company.MainPanel.superclass.beforeDestroy.call(this)}});
